#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

/*
 * 
 */
int main(int argc, char** argv) {

    int testNum = 0, number;
    
    cin >> testNum;
    
    while (testNum > 0) {
        
        cin >> number;
        
        if (number%2 == 0) {
            cout << "ALICE" << endl;
        } else
            cout << "BOB" << endl;
        
        testNum--;
    }
    
    return 0;
}
